name: [ROBOFENCE]
description:
NOTE! To restart the game simply click ENTER when in game over screen! Use arrows to navigate through sound sliders (highlight is invisible :,( )

You need to stay connected to your buildings as you need a lot of power to keep working.

Collect resources, create turrets and place them in order to keep humanity save as long as possible.

  • Move your character with WSAD or left stick.
  • To collect resources, move close enough to them.
  • Create turrets by standing on buttons.
  • Collect turrets by standing on crates.
  • Place turrets by pressing space or A button.

Share your scores in comments!

Game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2021 by two developers.
